artist: John M. Bennett; K. S. Ernst; Philip Gallo; Scott Helmes; Franz Kamin; Richard Kostelanetz; Published by Stamp Pad Press/ Hermetic Press, Minnepolis
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: six plates in an unbound booklet, with title page and index page; each plate labeled with artist's name; four folded sheets
dimension: 13 1/16 x 10 1/16 in. (33.18 x 25.56 cm) (sheet, each, folded)
provenance: Philip Gallo, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 2003.
title: Six Visual Poems
